ALL_DATA.ALL_PROV: SELECT UNIQUE PROVINCIAID, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES
ALL_DATA.ALL_CITIES: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES
ALL_DATA.ALL_SECTORS: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES

SPECIFIC_DATA.CIUDADES_ESPECIFICASxPROV: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE PROVINCIAID = _V1
SPECIFIC_DATA.SECTORES_ESPECIFICOSxCITY: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDADID = _V1
SPECIFIC_DATA.PROVINCIAS_ESPECIFICASxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE PROVINCIAID, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V1
SPECIFIC_DATA.CIUDADES_ESPECIFICASxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V1
SPECIFIC_DATA.SECTORES_ESPECIFICOSxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V1
SPECIFIC_DATA.CIUDADES_ESPECIFICASxPROVxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE PROVINCIAID = _V1 AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V2
SPECIFIC_DATA.SECTORES_ESPECIFICOSxCITYxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDADID =_V1 AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V2

MASIVE_DATA.CIUDADES_ESPECIFICASxPROVxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES PROVINCIAID IN (_V1) AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V2
MASIVE_DATA.SECTORES_ESPECIFICOSxCITYxTFV: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDADID IN (_V1) AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V2

OFER.AD_OFERTAS: SELECT UNIQUE OFFERID, OFERTA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES

PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLAN: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANID, TARIFFPLAN FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES
PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLANVARIANT: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SERVICIO='_V1' AND TIPO_SERVICIO='_V2' AND TECNOLOGIA='_V3'
PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLAN_TARIFFPLANVARIANT: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANID, TARIFFPLAN, TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES
PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLANVARIANT_STREAMING: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM YVIEW_OFFER_SERVICE_TARIFFPLAN WHERE SERVICIO = '_V1'

COMBO.COMBO_PLAN: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANID, TARIFFPLAN FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE SERVICIO ='_V1'
COMBO.COMBO_PLANVARIANT: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE TARIFFPLANID = _V1
COMBO.COMBO_PRODUCTO: SELECT UNIQUE PRODUCTID, PRODUCTO FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V1
COMBO.COMBO_TIPO_SERVICIO: SELECT UNIQUE TIPO_SERVICIO FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE PRODUCTID = _V1

Finance.ALL_BURO: SELECT ID, NAME FROM trepvaluelistitems a  WHERE a.valuelistsymbol = 'TVC_CalificacionBuro'
Finance.ALL_MPAGOS: SELECT ID, NAME FROM Trepvaluelistitems WHERE Valuelistsymbol IN ('PaymentType','ManualPaymentType')
Finance.DIAS_GOZADOS: SELECT ID, NAME FROM Trepvaluelistitems where VALUELISTSYMBOL = 'YN'
Finance.UPGRADE: SELECT ID, NAME || '(' || YPKG_ASIGNAPROMO.YFN_DevuelveVelocidadPorPlan(ID) || ' MB)' PLAN_UPGRADE FROM Ttatariffplanvariants WHERE Tariffplan_Id = _V1 AND ID <> _V2 AND YPKG_ASIGNAPROMO.YFN_DevuelveVelocidadPorPlan(ID) > YPKG_ASIGNAPROMO.YFN_DevuelveVelocidadPorPlan(_V2)
